title: Anti-Muslim Hatred Working Group

details.body:
Role

The working group brings together government officials and non-government experts to consider and tackle anti-Muslim hatred.

The group’s current key priority areas are:

  • tackling the far right and counter jihadists
  • public transport awareness campaign to encourage reporting of anti-Muslim hatred incidents
  • anti-Muslim bullying in schools
  • Muslim literacy in the media
  • protection of mosques and Muslim community centres

Terms of reference

Anti-Muslim Hatred Working Group Terms of Reference (PDF, 201KB, 2 pages)

description: The cross-government Anti-Muslim Hatred Working Group is made up of representatives from the Muslim community, independent experts, academics, and government departments. The group considers and takes forward proposals to tackle anti-Muslim hatred.
